title: Homestead National Monument of America: Natural Features & Ecosystems
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Natural Features & Ecosystems               Natural Features & Ecosystems         Prairie glows with sunflowers at the woodland's edge. NPS Photo.  Homestead National Monument of America protects natural environments that have become rare today. Experience native prairie and woodland ecosystems as they were before the first homesteaders arrived in the area.  Learn about the tallgrass prairie and bur oak woodland.
